title: Epitaph for Soteris

handNote.lettering: Angular Ε and Σ, cursive Ω, Α, Δ, Λ with extended serifs, Chi-Rho symbol at the end of the inscription.

provenanceFound._: Found in 1739 “in via, quae ad suburbium ducit” according to Amico, “fuori la Porta di Aci”, according to Ferrara”.

provenanceObserved._: Observed by Amico and Castelli in Museo Biscari, later by Korhonen in Magazzino superiore, Collezione Biscari (formerly sala VIII 65).

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana

location.address: Castello Ursino, Piazza Federico II di Svevia, 95121 Catania (CT)
